price: Mkamwacha Yeye. Basi nyote nyinyi nipangieni vitimbi, na kisha msinipe muhula!
arabic: مِن دُونِهِۦۖ فَكِيدُونِي جَمِيعٗا ثُمَّ لَا تُنظِرُونِ
footnotes: Wala mimi sikujalini, wala siwajali miungu yenu hiyo ambayo mnadai kuwa imenipatiliza kwa uovu! Basi saidianeni, nyinyi na miungu yenu, kunifanyia vitimbi. Kisha wala msiakhirishe hiyo adhabu yenu kwangu hata dakika moja, kama mnaweza!

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: min dūnihi fakīdūnī jamīʿan thumma lā tunẓirūni
